query.name: countViewNotesForAssignedUserInStudy
query.sql: select count(dn.discrepancy_note_id) as COUNT from discrepancy_note dn where dn.assigned_user_id = ? AND dn.study_id in (SELECT study_id FROM study WHERE study_id = ? or parent_study_id=?) AND ((dn.parent_dn_id IS NULL) or (dn.parent_dn_id = 0)) AND (dn.resolution_status_id=1 OR dn.resolution_status_id=2 OR dn.resolution_status_id=3)

query.name: findByPK
query.sql: SELECT * FROM discrepancy_note WHERE discrepancy_note_id = ?

query.name: findAll
query.sql: SELECT * FROM discrepancy_note

query.name: findAllSubjectDNByStudy
query.sql: SELECT dn.*, ss.label, dstat.age, dstat.days FROM study_subject ss, dn_subject_map ds, view_dn_stats dstat, discrepancy_note dn left outer join user_account ua on ua.user_id = dn.assigned_user_id WHERE ss.study_id in ( SELECT study_id FROM study WHERE study_id = ? or parent_study_id=? ) AND ss.subject_id = ds.subject_id AND dn.discrepancy_note_id = ds.discrepancy_note_id AND ((dn.parent_dn_id IS NULL) or (dn.parent_dn_id = 0)) AND dn.discrepancy_note_id = dstat.discrepancy_note_id

query.name: findAllStudySubjectDNByStudy
query.sql: SELECT dn.*,ss.label, dstat.age, dstat.days FROM study_subject ss, dn_study_subject_map dss, view_dn_stats dstat, discrepancy_note dn left outer join user_account ua on ua.user_id = dn.assigned_user_id WHERE ss.study_id in ( SELECT study_id FROM study WHERE study_id = ? or parent_study_id=? ) AND ss.study_subject_id = dss.study_subject_id AND dn.discrepancy_note_id = dss.discrepancy_note_id AND ((dn.parent_dn_id IS NULL) or (dn.parent_dn_id = 0)) AND dn.discrepancy_note_id = dstat.discrepancy_note_id

query.name: findAllStudyEventDNByStudy
query.sql: SELECT dn.*,ss.label, dstat.age, dstat.days FROM study_subject ss, study_event se, dn_study_event_map dse, view_dn_stats dstat, discrepancy_note dn left outer join user_account ua on ua.user_id = dn.assigned_user_id WHERE ss.study_id in ( SELECT study_id FROM study WHERE study_id = ? or parent_study_id=? ) AND ss.study_subject_id = se.study_subject_id AND se.study_event_id = dse.study_event_id AND dn.discrepancy_note_id = dse.discrepancy_note_id AND ((dn.parent_dn_id IS NULL) or (dn.parent_dn_id = 0)) AND dn.discrepancy_note_id = dstat.discrepancy_note_id

query.name: findAllEventCrfDNByStudy
query.sql: SELECT dn.*,ss.label, dstat.age, dstat.days FROM study_subject ss, event_crf ec, dn_event_crf_map dec, view_dn_stats dstat, discrepancy_note dn left outer join user_account ua on ua.user_id = dn.assigned_user_id WHERE ss.study_id in ( SELECT study_id FROM study WHERE study_id = ? or parent_study_id=? ) AND ss.study_subject_id = ec.study_subject_id AND ec.event_crf_id = dec.event_crf_id AND dn.discrepancy_note_id = dec.discrepancy_note_id AND ((dn.parent_dn_id IS NULL) or (dn.parent_dn_id = 0)) AND dn.discrepancy_note_id = dstat.discrepancy_note_id

query.name: findAllItemDataDNByStudy
query.sql: SELECT dn.*,ss.label, dstat.age, dstat.days FROM study_subject ss, event_crf ec, item_data itd, dn_item_data_map did, view_dn_stats dstat, discrepancy_note dn left outer join user_account ua on ua.user_id = dn.assigned_user_id WHERE ss.study_id in ( SELECT study_id FROM study WHERE study_id = ? or parent_study_id=? ) AND ss.study_subject_id = ec.study_subject_id AND ec.event_crf_id = itd.event_crf_id AND itd.item_data_id = did.item_data_id AND dn.discrepancy_note_id = did.discrepancy_note_id AND ((dn.parent_dn_id IS NULL) or (dn.parent_dn_id = 0)) AND dn.discrepancy_note_id = dstat.discrepancy_note_id

query.name: getCountWithFilter
query.sql: SELECT COUNT(dn.*) from discrepancy_note dn,study s, study_subject ss, user_account ua where dn.study_id = s.study_id and ( s.study_id =? or s.parent_study_id =?) and dn.parent_dn_id is null

query.name: getWithFilterAndSort
query.sql: SELECT dn.* from discrepancy_note dn,study s, user_account ua where dn.study_id = s.study_id and dn.assigned_user_id = ua.user_id and ( s.study_id =? or s.parent_study_id =? ) and dn.parent_dn_id is null

query.name: findAllParentsByStudy
query.sql: SELECT * FROM discrepancy_note WHERE ((parent_dn_id IS NULL) or (parent_dn_id = 0)) AND (study_id = ? OR study_id in (SELECT study_id FROM study WHERE parent_study_id=?))

query.name: findAllByStudyAndParent
query.sql: SELECT * FROM discrepancy_note WHERE parent_dn_id = ? AND (study_id = ? OR study_id in (SELECT study_id FROM study WHERE parent_study_id=?) OR study_id in (SELECT parent_study_id FROM study WHERE study_id=?) ) ORDER BY date_created

query.name: findAllSubjectByStudy
query.sql: SELECT dn.*, ss.label,dsm.column_name,dsm.subject_id FROM discrepancy_note dn, dn_subject_map dsm, study_subject ss, subject sub WHERE (dn.study_id = ? OR dn.study_id in (SELECT study_id FROM study WHERE parent_study_id=?)) AND dn.discrepancy_note_id=dsm.discrepancy_note_id AND dsm.subject_id = sub.subject_id AND ss.study_id = ? AND ss.subject_id = sub.subject_id AND ((dn.parent_dn_id IS NULL) or (dn.parent_dn_id = 0))

query.name: findAllSubjectByStudyAndId
query.sql: SELECT dn.*, ss.label,dsm.column_name,dsm.subject_id FROM discrepancy_note dn, dn_subject_map dsm, study_subject ss, subject sub WHERE (dn.study_id = ? OR dn.study_id in (SELECT study_id FROM study WHERE parent_study_id=?)) AND dn.discrepancy_note_id=dsm.discrepancy_note_id AND dsm.subject_id = sub.subject_id AND ss.study_id = ? AND ss.subject_id = ? AND ss.subject_id = sub.subject_id AND ((dn.parent_dn_id IS NULL) or (dn.parent_dn_id = 0))

query.name: findAllSubjectByStudiesAndSubjectId
query.sql: SELECT dn.*, ss.label,dsm.column_name,dsm.subject_id FROM discrepancy_note dn, dn_subject_map dsm, study_subject ss, subject sub WHERE (dn.study_id in (?,?) OR dn.study_id in (SELECT study_id FROM study WHERE parent_study_id = ?)) AND dn.discrepancy_note_id=dsm.discrepancy_note_id AND dsm.subject_id = sub.subject_id AND ss.study_id in (?,?) AND ss.subject_id = ? AND ss.subject_id = sub.subject_id AND ((dn.parent_dn_id IS NULL) or (dn.parent_dn_id = 0))

query.name: findAllStudyEventByStudy
query.sql: SELECT dn.*, ss.label, se.date_start, sed.name as sed_name, dsm.column_name, dsm.study_event_id FROM discrepancy_note dn, dn_study_event_map dsm , study_event se, study_event_definition sed, study_subject ss WHERE (dn.study_id = ? OR dn.study_id in (SELECT study_id FROM study WHERE parent_study_id=?)) AND dn.discrepancy_note_id=dsm.discrepancy_note_id AND dsm.study_event_id =se.study_event_id AND sed.study_event_definition_id= se.study_event_definition_id AND se.study_subject_id = ss.study_subject_id AND ((dn.parent_dn_id IS NULL) or (dn.parent_dn_id = 0))

query.name: findAllStudyEventByStudyAndId
query.sql: SELECT dn.*, ss.label, se.date_start, sed.name as sed_name, dsm.column_name, dsm.study_event_id FROM discrepancy_note dn, dn_study_event_map dsm , study_event se, study_event_definition sed, study_subject ss WHERE (dn.study_id = ? OR dn.study_id in (SELECT study_id FROM study WHERE parent_study_id=?)) AND dn.discrepancy_note_id=dsm.discrepancy_note_id AND dsm.study_event_id =se.study_event_id AND sed.study_event_definition_id= se.study_event_definition_id AND se.study_subject_id = ? AND se.study_subject_id = ss.study_subject_id AND ((dn.parent_dn_id IS NULL) or (dn.parent_dn_id = 0))

query.name: findAllStudyEventByStudiesAndSubjectId
query.sql: SELECT dn.*, ss.label, se.date_start, sed.name as sed_name, dsm.column_name, dsm.study_event_id FROM discrepancy_note dn, dn_study_event_map dsm , study_event se, study_event_definition sed, study_subject ss WHERE (dn.study_id in (?,?) OR dn.study_id in (SELECT study_id FROM study WHERE parent_study_id=?)) AND dn.discrepancy_note_id=dsm.discrepancy_note_id AND dsm.study_event_id =se.study_event_id AND sed.study_event_definition_id= se.study_event_definition_id AND se.study_subject_id = ? AND se.study_subject_id = ss.study_subject_id AND ((dn.parent_dn_id IS NULL) or (dn.parent_dn_id = 0))

query.name: findAllStudySubjectByStudy
query.sql: SELECT dn.*, ss.label,dsm.column_name, dsm.study_subject_id FROM discrepancy_note dn, dn_study_subject_map dsm , study_subject ss WHERE (dn.study_id = ? OR dn.study_id in (SELECT study_id FROM study WHERE parent_study_id=?)) AND dn.discrepancy_note_id=dsm.discrepancy_note_id AND dsm.study_subject_id = ss.study_subject_id AND ((dn.parent_dn_id IS NULL) or (dn.parent_dn_id = 0))

query.name: findAllStudySubjectByStudyAndId
query.sql: SELECT dn.*, ss.label,dsm.column_name, dsm.study_subject_id FROM discrepancy_note dn, dn_study_subject_map dsm , study_subject ss WHERE (dn.study_id = ? OR dn.study_id in (SELECT study_id FROM study WHERE parent_study_id=?)) AND dn.discrepancy_note_id=dsm.discrepancy_note_id AND ss.study_subject_id = ? AND dsm.study_subject_id = ss.study_subject_id AND ((dn.parent_dn_id IS NULL) or (dn.parent_dn_id = 0))

query.name: findAllStudySubjectByStudiesAndStudySubjectId
query.sql: SELECT dn.*, ss.label,dsm.column_name, dsm.study_subject_id FROM discrepancy_note dn, dn_study_subject_map dsm , study_subject ss WHERE (dn.study_id in (?,?) OR dn.study_id in (SELECT study_id FROM study WHERE parent_study_id=?)) AND dn.discrepancy_note_id=dsm.discrepancy_note_id AND ss.study_subject_id = ? AND dsm.study_subject_id = ss.study_subject_id AND ((dn.parent_dn_id IS NULL) or (dn.parent_dn_id = 0))

query.name: findAllEventCRFByStudy
query.sql: SELECT dn.*, ss.label, se.date_start, sed.name as sed_name, crf.name as crf_name, dsm.column_name,dsm.event_crf_id FROM discrepancy_note dn, dn_event_crf_map dsm , event_crf ec, study_event se, study_event_definition sed, crf_version cv, study_subject ss, crf WHERE (dn.study_id = ? OR dn.study_id in (SELECT study_id FROM study WHERE parent_study_id=?)) AND dn.discrepancy_note_id=dsm.discrepancy_note_id AND ec.event_crf_id = dsm.event_crf_id AND ec.study_event_id=se.study_event_id AND sed.study_event_definition_id= se.study_event_definition_id AND se.study_subject_id = ss.study_subject_id AND ec.crf_version_id=cv.crf_version_id AND cv.crf_id = crf.crf_id AND ((dn.parent_dn_id IS NULL) or (dn.parent_dn_id = 0))

query.name: findAllEventCRFByStudyAndParent
query.sql: SELECT dn.*, ss.label, se.date_start, sed.name as sed_name, crf.name as crf_name, dsm.column_name,dsm.event_crf_id FROM discrepancy_note dn, dn_event_crf_map dsm , event_crf ec, study_event se, study_event_definition sed, crf_version cv, study_subject ss, crf WHERE (dn.study_id = ? OR dn.study_id in (SELECT study_id FROM study WHERE parent_study_id=?)) AND dn.discrepancy_note_id=dsm.discrepancy_note_id AND ec.event_crf_id = dsm.event_crf_id AND ec.study_event_id=se.study_event_id AND sed.study_event_definition_id= se.study_event_definition_id AND se.study_subject_id = ss.study_subject_id AND ec.crf_version_id=cv.crf_version_id AND cv.crf_id = crf.crf_id AND dn.parent_dn_id = ?

query.name: findAllItemDataByStudy
query.sql: SELECT dn.*, ss.label, se.date_start, se.study_event_definition_id as sed_id, sed.name as sed_name, crf.name as crf_name, it.name as item_name, id.value, it.item_id, dsm.item_data_id FROM discrepancy_note dn, dn_item_data_map dsm , item_data id, item it, event_crf ec, study_event se, study_event_definition sed, crf_version cv, study_subject ss, crf WHERE (dn.study_id = ? OR dn.study_id in (SELECT study_id FROM study WHERE parent_study_id=?)) AND dn.discrepancy_note_id=dsm.discrepancy_note_id AND dsm.item_data_id = id.item_data_id AND id.item_id = it.item_id AND ec.event_crf_id = id.event_crf_id AND ec.study_event_id=se.study_event_id AND sed.study_event_definition_id= se.study_event_definition_id AND se.study_subject_id = ss.study_subject_id AND ec.crf_version_id=cv.crf_version_id AND cv.crf_id = crf.crf_id AND ((dn.parent_dn_id IS NULL) or (dn.parent_dn_id = 0))

query.name: countAllItemDataByStudyAndUser
query.sql: SELECT count(dn.*) FROM discrepancy_note dn, dn_item_data_map dsm , item_data id, item it, event_crf ec, study_event se, study_event_definition sed, crf_version cv, study_subject ss, crf WHERE (dn.study_id = ? OR dn.study_id in (SELECT study_id FROM study WHERE parent_study_id=?)) AND dn.discrepancy_note_id=dsm.discrepancy_note_id AND dsm.item_data_id = id.item_data_id AND id.item_id = it.item_id AND ec.event_crf_id = id.event_crf_id AND ec.study_event_id=se.study_event_id AND sed.study_event_definition_id= se.study_event_definition_id AND se.study_subject_id = ss.study_subject_id AND ec.crf_version_id=cv.crf_version_id AND cv.crf_id = crf.crf_id AND ((dn.parent_dn_id IS NULL) or (dn.parent_dn_id = 0)) AND dn.assigned_user_id=?

query.name: findAllItemDataByStudyAndParent
query.sql: SELECT dn.*, ss.label, se.date_start, sed.name as sed_name, crf.name as crf_name, it.name as item_name, id.value, it.item_id, dsm.item_data_id FROM discrepancy_note dn, dn_item_data_map dsm , item_data id, item it, event_crf ec, study_event se, study_event_definition sed, crf_version cv, study_subject ss, crf WHERE (dn.study_id = ? OR dn.study_id in (SELECT study_id FROM study WHERE parent_study_id=?)) AND dn.discrepancy_note_id=dsm.discrepancy_note_id AND dsm.item_data_id = id.item_data_id AND id.item_id = it.item_id AND ec.event_crf_id = id.event_crf_id AND ec.study_event_id=se.study_event_id AND sed.study_event_definition_id= se.study_event_definition_id AND se.study_subject_id = ss.study_subject_id AND ec.crf_version_id=cv.crf_version_id AND cv.crf_id = crf.crf_id AND dn.parent_dn_id = ?

query.name: findAllEventCRFByPK
query.sql: SELECT dn.*, ss.label, se.date_start, sed.name as sed_name, crf.name as crf_name,dsm.column_name FROM discrepancy_note dn, dn_event_crf_map dsm , event_crf ec, study_event se, study_event_definition sed, crf_version cv, study_subject ss, crf WHERE (dn.discrepancy_note_id = ? OR dn.parent_dn_id=?) AND dn.discrepancy_note_id=dsm.discrepancy_note_id AND ec.event_crf_id = dsm.event_crf_id AND ec.study_event_id=se.study_event_id AND sed.study_event_definition_id= se.study_event_definition_id AND se.study_subject_id = ss.study_subject_id AND ec.crf_version_id=cv.crf_version_id AND cv.crf_id = crf.crf_id order by dn.date_created desc

query.name: findAllItemDataByPK
query.sql: SELECT dn.*, ss.label, se.date_start, sed.name as sed_name, crf.name as crf_name,it.name as item_name, id.value, it.item_id, dsm.item_data_id FROM discrepancy_note dn, dn_item_data_map dsm , item_data id, event_crf ec, study_event se, study_event_definition sed, crf_version cv, study_subject ss, crf, item it WHERE (dn.discrepancy_note_id = ? OR dn.parent_dn_id=?) AND dn.discrepancy_note_id=dsm.discrepancy_note_id AND dsm.item_data_id = id.item_data_id AND id.item_id = it.item_id AND ec.event_crf_id = id.event_crf_id AND ec.study_event_id=se.study_event_id AND sed.study_event_definition_id= se.study_event_definition_id AND se.study_subject_id = ss.study_subject_id AND ec.crf_version_id=cv.crf_version_id AND cv.crf_id = crf.crf_id order by dn.date_created desc

query.name: findAllStudySubjectByPK
query.sql: SELECT dn.*, ss.label,dsm.column_name FROM discrepancy_note dn, dn_study_subject_map dsm , study_subject ss WHERE (dn.discrepancy_note_id = ? OR dn.parent_dn_id=?) AND dn.discrepancy_note_id=dsm.discrepancy_note_id AND dsm.study_subject_id = ss.study_subject_id order by dn.date_created desc

query.name: findAllSubjectByPK
query.sql: SELECT dn.*, ss.label,dsm.column_name FROM discrepancy_note dn, dn_subject_map dsm , study_subject ss, subject sub WHERE (dn.discrepancy_note_id = ? OR dn.parent_dn_id=?) AND dn.discrepancy_note_id=dsm.discrepancy_note_id AND dsm.subject_id = sub.subject_id AND ss.subject_id = sub.subject_id order by dn.date_created desc

query.name: findAllStudyEventByPK
query.sql: SELECT dn.*, ss.label, se.date_start, sed.name as sed_name, dsm.column_name FROM discrepancy_note dn, dn_study_event_map dsm , study_event se, study_event_definition sed, study_subject ss WHERE (dn.discrepancy_note_id = ? OR dn.parent_dn_id=?) AND dn.discrepancy_note_id=dsm.discrepancy_note_id AND dsm.study_event_id =se.study_event_id AND sed.study_event_definition_id= se.study_event_definition_id AND se.study_subject_id = ss.study_subject_id order by dn.date_created desc

query.name: findAllBySubjectAndColumn
query.sql: SELECT dn.*,ss.label FROM discrepancy_note dn, dn_subject_map dsm, study_subject ss, subject sub where dsm.subject_id=? AND dsm.column_name=? AND dn.discrepancy_note_id=dsm.discrepancy_note_id AND dsm.subject_id = sub.subject_id AND ss.subject_id = sub.subject_id order by dn.date_created desc

query.name: findAllByStudySubjectAndColumn
query.sql: SELECT dn.* ,ss.label FROM discrepancy_note dn, dn_study_subject_map dsm, study_subject ss where dsm.study_subject_id=? AND dsm.column_name=? AND dn.discrepancy_note_id=dsm.discrepancy_note_id AND dsm.study_subject_id = ss.study_subject_id ORDER BY dn.date_created DESC

query.name: findAllByStudyEventAndColumn
query.sql: SELECT dn.*, ss.label, se.date_start, sed.name as sed_name FROM discrepancy_note dn, dn_study_event_map dsm , study_event se, study_event_definition sed, study_subject ss where dsm.study_event_id=? AND dsm.column_name=? AND dn.discrepancy_note_id=dsm.discrepancy_note_id AND dsm.study_event_id =se.study_event_id AND sed.study_event_definition_id= se.study_event_definition_id AND se.study_subject_id = ss.study_subject_id order by dn.date_created desc

query.name: findAllByEventCRFAndColumn
query.sql: SELECT dn.*, ss.label, se.date_start, sed.name as sed_name, crf.name as crf_name FROM discrepancy_note dn, dn_event_crf_map dsm, event_crf ec, study_event se, study_event_definition sed, crf_version cv, study_subject ss, crf where dsm.event_crf_id=? AND dsm.column_name=? AND dn.discrepancy_note_id=dsm.discrepancy_note_id AND ec.event_crf_id = dsm.event_crf_id AND ec.study_event_id=se.study_event_id AND sed.study_event_definition_id= se.study_event_definition_id AND se.study_subject_id = ss.study_subject_id AND ec.crf_version_id=cv.crf_version_id AND cv.crf_id = crf.crf_id order by dn.date_created desc

query.name: findAllByItemDataAndColumn
query.sql: SELECT dn.* , ss.label, se.date_start, sed.name as sed_name, crf.name as crf_name,it.name as item_name FROM discrepancy_note dn, dn_item_data_map dsm, item_data id, event_crf ec, study_event se, study_event_definition sed, crf_version cv, study_subject ss, crf, item it where dsm.item_data_id=? AND dsm.column_name=? AND dn.discrepancy_note_id=dsm.discrepancy_note_id AND dsm.item_data_id = id.item_data_id AND id.item_id = it.item_id AND ec.event_crf_id = id.event_crf_id AND ec.study_event_id=se.study_event_id AND sed.study_event_definition_id= se.study_event_definition_id AND se.study_subject_id = ss.study_subject_id AND ec.crf_version_id=cv.crf_version_id AND cv.crf_id = crf.crf_id order by dn.date_created desc

query.name: findAllItemNotesByEventCRF
query.sql: SELECT distinct dn.* FROM discrepancy_note dn, dn_item_data_map dsm, item_data id where id.event_crf_id=? AND dsm.column_name='value' AND dn.entity_type='itemData' AND dn.discrepancy_note_id=dsm.discrepancy_note_id AND dsm.item_data_id = id.item_data_id order by dn.date_created desc

query.name: findAllParentItemNotesByEventCRF
query.sql: SELECT distinct dn.* FROM discrepancy_note dn, dn_item_data_map dsm, item_data id where id.event_crf_id=? AND dsm.column_name='value' AND dn.entity_type='itemData' AND dn.discrepancy_note_id=dsm.discrepancy_note_id AND dsm.item_data_id = id.item_data_id AND dn.parent_dn_id is null order by dn.date_created desc

query.name: findAllByParent
query.sql: SELECT dn.* FROM discrepancy_note dn WHERE parent_dn_id=? ORDER BY dn.date_created ASC

query.name: findByStudyEvent
query.sql: select dn.resolution_status_id,count(dn.resolution_status_id) from discrepancy_note dn,dn_item_data_map didm,event_crf ec,item_data ed,study_event se where SE.study_event_id = ec.study_event_id AND EC.event_crf_id = ed.event_crf_id AND ed.item_data_id = didm.item_data_id AND didm.discrepancy_note_id = dn.discrepancy_note_id AND se.study_event_id = ? AND dn.parent_dn_id is null

query.name: countBySubjectTypeAndStudyEvent
query.sql: select dn.resolution_status_id,count(dn.resolution_status_id) from discrepancy_note dn, dn_subject_map dsm, study_event se, study_subject ss where dsm.subject_id = ss.subject_id and ss.study_subject_id = se.study_subject_id and dsm.discrepancy_note_id = dn.discrepancy_note_id and se.study_event_id = ? and dn.parent_dn_id is null

query.name: countByStudySubjectTypeAndStudyEvent
query.sql: select dn.resolution_status_id,count(dn.resolution_status_id) from discrepancy_note dn, dn_study_subject_map dssm, study_event se where dssm.study_subject_id = se.study_subject_id and dssm.discrepancy_note_id = dn.discrepancy_note_id and se.study_event_id = ? and dn.parent_dn_id is null

query.name: countByEventCrfTypeAndStudyEvent
query.sql: select dn.resolution_status_id,count(dn.resolution_status_id) from discrepancy_note dn, dn_event_crf_map decm, event_crf ec, study_event se where se.study_event_id = ec.study_event_id and ec.event_crf_id = decm.event_crf_id and decm.discrepancy_note_id = dn.discrepancy_note_id and se.study_event_id = ? and dn.parent_dn_id is null

query.name: countByStudyEventTypeAndStudyEvent
query.sql: select dn.resolution_status_id,count(dn.resolution_status_id) from discrepancy_note dn, dn_study_event_map dsem, study_event se where dsem.study_event_id = se.study_event_id and dsem.discrepancy_note_id = dn.discrepancy_note_id and se.study_event_id = ? and dn.parent_dn_id is null

query.name: create
query.sql: INSERT INTO discrepancy_note (description, discrepancy_note_type_id , resolution_status_id , detailed_notes , date_created, owner_id, parent_dn_id, entity_type, study_id, assigned_user_id) VALUES (?,?,?,?,now(),?,?, ?, ?, ?)

query.name: update
query.sql: update discrepancy_note set description =?, discrepancy_note_type_id =? , resolution_status_id =? , detailed_notes =? where discrepancy_note_id=?

query.name: updateAssignedUser
query.sql: update discrepancy_note set assigned_user_id = ? where discrepancy_note_id=?

query.name: updateAssignedUserToNull
query.sql: update discrepancy_note set assigned_user_id = null where discrepancy_note_id=?

query.name: updateDnMapActivation
query.sql: update dn_item_data_map set activated = ? where item_data_id=?

query.name: deleteNotes
query.sql: delete from discrepancy_note where discrepancy_note_id = ?

query.name: createSubjectMap
query.sql: INSERT INTO dn_subject_map (subject_id, discrepancy_note_id, column_name) VALUES (?,?,?)

query.name: createStudySubjectMap
query.sql: INSERT INTO dn_study_subject_map (study_subject_id, discrepancy_note_id, column_name) VALUES (?,?,?)

query.name: createStudyEventMap
query.sql: INSERT INTO dn_study_event_map (study_event_id, discrepancy_note_id, column_name) VALUES (?,?,?)

query.name: createEventCRFMap
query.sql: INSERT INTO dn_event_crf_map (event_crf_id, discrepancy_note_id, column_name) VALUES (?,?,?)

query.name: createItemDataMap
query.sql: INSERT INTO dn_item_data_map (item_data_id, discrepancy_note_id, column_name,activated) VALUES (?,?,?,?)

query.name: findSubjectMapByDNId
query.sql: SELECT * FROM dn_subject_map WHERE discrepancy_note_id=?

query.name: findStudySubjectMapByDNId
query.sql: SELECT * FROM dn_study_subject_map WHERE discrepancy_note_id=?

query.name: findStudyEventMapByDNId
query.sql: SELECT * FROM dn_study_event_map WHERE discrepancy_note_id=?

query.name: findEventCRFMapByDNId
query.sql: SELECT * FROM dn_event_crf_map WHERE discrepancy_note_id=?

query.name: findItemDataMapByDNId
query.sql: SELECT * FROM dn_item_data_map WHERE discrepancy_note_id=?

query.name: getCurrentPrimaryKey
query.sql: SELECT currval('discrepancy_note_discrepancy_note_id_seq') AS key

query.name: findNumExistingNotesForItem
query.sql: SELECT count(*) as num FROM discrepancy_note dn, dn_item_data_map dsm where dsm.item_data_id=? AND dn.discrepancy_note_id=dsm.discrepancy_note_id

query.name: findNumOfActiveExistingNotesForItemData
query.sql: SELECT count(*) as num FROM discrepancy_note dn, dn_item_data_map didm where didm.item_data_id=? AND didm.activated = true AND dn.discrepancy_note_id=didm.discrepancy_note_id

query.name: findExistingNotesForItemData
query.sql: SELECT dn.* FROM discrepancy_note dn, dn_item_data_map dsm where dsm.item_data_id=? AND dn.discrepancy_note_id=dsm.discrepancy_note_id

query.name: findParentNotesOnlyByItemData
query.sql: SELECT dn.* FROM discrepancy_note dn, dn_item_data_map didm where didm.item_data_id=? AND dn.parent_dn_id isnull AND dn.discrepancy_note_id=didm.discrepancy_note_id

query.name: findExistingNotesForToolTip
findParentNotesForToolTip
query.sql:
SELECT dnParent.* FROM discrepancy_note dnParent where dnParent.discrepancy_note_id = ( SELECT dn.parent_dn_id FROM discrepancy_note dn, dn_item_data_map dsm,item_data id where dsm.item_data_id= ? AND dn.discrepancy_note_id=dsm.discrepancy_note_id and dsm.item_data_id = id.item_data_id and dn.discrepancy_note_id in (select max(dn2.discrepancy_note_id) FROM discrepancy_note dn2, dn_item_data_map dsms,item_data id where dsms.item_data_id= ? AND dn2.discrepancy_note_id=dsms.discrepancy_note_id and dsms.item_data_id = id.item_data_id
) )

query.name: findItemDataDNotesFromEventCRF
query.sql: SELECT dn.* FROM discrepancy_note dn, dn_item_data_map dn_idmap, item_data idata, event_crf eventcrf WHERE eventcrf.event_crf_id = ? AND idata.event_crf_id = eventcrf.event_crf_id AND idata.item_data_id =dn_idmap.item_data_id AND dn_idmap.discrepancy_note_id=dn.discrepancy_note_id

query.name: findParentItemDataDNotesFromEventCRF
query.sql: SELECT dn.* FROM discrepancy_note dn, dn_item_data_map dn_idmap, item_data idata, event_crf eventcrf WHERE eventcrf.event_crf_id = ? AND idata.event_crf_id = eventcrf.event_crf_id AND idata.item_data_id =dn_idmap.item_data_id AND dn_idmap.discrepancy_note_id=dn.discrepancy_note_id AND ((dn.parent_dn_id IS NULL) or (dn.parent_dn_id = 0))

query.name: findEventCRFDNotesFromEventCRF
query.sql: SELECT dn.*, eventcrf_map.column_name FROM discrepancy_note dn, dn_event_crf_map eventcrf_map, event_crf eventcrf WHERE eventcrf.event_crf_id = ? AND eventcrf.event_crf_id=eventcrf_map.event_crf_id AND eventcrf_map.discrepancy_note_id=dn.discrepancy_note_id

query.name: findEventCRFDNotesForToolTips
query.sql:
SELECT dn.*, eventcrf_map.column_name FROM discrepancy_note dn, dn_event_crf_map eventcrf_map, event_crf eventcrf WHERE eventcrf.event_crf_id =? AND eventcrf.event_crf_id=eventcrf_map.event_crf_id AND eventcrf_map.discrepancy_note_id=dn.discrepancy_note_id and dn.parent_dn_id !=0 and column_name='date_interviewed' and dn.discrepancy_note_id = (select max(dn2.discrepancy_note_id) from discrepancy_note dn2,event_crf eventcrf2,dn_event_crf_map eventcrf_map2 where eventcrf2.event_crf_id=eventcrf_map2.event_crf_id and eventcrf2.event_crf_id = ? AND eventcrf_map2.discrepancy_note_id=dn2.discrepancy_note_id and column_name='date_interviewed') union
SELECT dn.*, eventcrf_map.column_name FROM discrepancy_note dn, dn_event_crf_map eventcrf_map, event_crf eventcrf WHERE eventcrf.event_crf_id =? AND eventcrf.event_crf_id=eventcrf_map.event_crf_id AND eventcrf_map.discrepancy_note_id=dn.discrepancy_note_id and dn.discrepancy_note_id = (SELECT dn.parent_dn_id FROM discrepancy_note dn, dn_event_crf_map eventcrf_map, event_crf eventcrf WHERE eventcrf.event_crf_id =? AND eventcrf.event_crf_id=eventcrf_map.event_crf_id AND eventcrf_map.discrepancy_note_id=dn.discrepancy_note_id and dn.parent_dn_id !=0 and column_name='date_interviewed' and dn.discrepancy_note_id = (select max(dn2.discrepancy_note_id) from discrepancy_note dn2,event_crf eventcrf2,dn_event_crf_map eventcrf_map2 where eventcrf2.event_crf_id=eventcrf_map2.event_crf_id and eventcrf2.event_crf_id = ? AND eventcrf_map2.discrepancy_note_id=dn2.discrepancy_note_id and column_name='date_interviewed')) union SELECT dn.*, eventcrf_map.column_name FROM discrepancy_note dn, dn_event_crf_map eventcrf_map, event_crf eventcrf WHERE eventcrf.event_crf_id =? AND eventcrf.event_crf_id=eventcrf_map.event_crf_id AND eventcrf_map.discrepancy_note_id=dn.discrepancy_note_id and dn.parent_dn_id !=0 and column_name='interviewer_name' and dn.discrepancy_note_id = (select max(dn2.discrepancy_note_id) from discrepancy_note dn2,event_crf eventcrf2,dn_event_crf_map eventcrf_map2 where eventcrf2.event_crf_id=eventcrf_map2.event_crf_id and eventcrf2.event_crf_id = ? AND eventcrf_map2.discrepancy_note_id=dn2.discrepancy_note_id and column_name='interviewer_name') union
SELECT dn.*, eventcrf_map.column_name FROM discrepancy_note dn, dn_event_crf_map eventcrf_map, event_crf eventcrf WHERE eventcrf.event_crf_id =? AND eventcrf.event_crf_id=eventcrf_map.event_crf_id AND eventcrf_map.discrepancy_note_id=dn.discrepancy_note_id and dn.discrepancy_note_id = (SELECT dn.parent_dn_id FROM discrepancy_note dn, dn_event_crf_map eventcrf_map, event_crf eventcrf WHERE eventcrf.event_crf_id =? AND eventcrf.event_crf_id=eventcrf_map.event_crf_id AND eventcrf_map.discrepancy_note_id=dn.discrepancy_note_id and dn.parent_dn_id !=0 and column_name='interviewer_name' and dn.discrepancy_note_id = (select max(dn2.discrepancy_note_id) from discrepancy_note dn2,event_crf eventcrf2,dn_event_crf_map eventcrf_map2 where eventcrf2.event_crf_id=eventcrf_map2.event_crf_id and eventcrf2.event_crf_id = ? AND eventcrf_map2.discrepancy_note_id=dn2.discrepancy_note_id and column_name='interviewer_name'))

query.name: findAllDNotesByItemNameAndEventCRF
query.sql: SELECT dn.* FROM discrepancy_note dn, dn_item_data_map dsm, item_data id, item it where id.event_crf_id = ? AND dn.discrepancy_note_id=dsm.discrepancy_note_id AND dsm.item_data_id = id.item_data_id AND id.item_id = it.item_id AND it.name = ?

query.name: findOnlyParentEventCRFDNotesFromEventCRF
query.sql: SELECT dn.*, eventcrf_map.column_name FROM discrepancy_note dn, dn_event_crf_map eventcrf_map, event_crf eventcrf WHERE eventcrf.event_crf_id = ? AND eventcrf.event_crf_id=eventcrf_map.event_crf_id AND eventcrf_map.discrepancy_note_id=dn.discrepancy_note_id AND ((dn.parent_dn_id IS NULL) or (dn.parent_dn_id = 0))

query.name: findAllTopNotesByEventCRF
query.sql: SELECT distinct dn.* FROM discrepancy_note dn, dn_item_data_map dsm, item_data id where id.event_crf_id=? AND dsm.column_name='value' AND (dn.entity_type='itemData' or dn.entity_type='ItemData') AND ((dn.parent_dn_id IS NULL) or (dn.parent_dn_id = 0)) AND dn.discrepancy_note_id=dsm.discrepancy_note_id AND dsm.item_data_id = id.item_data_id order by dn.date_created desc

query.name: findLatestChildByParent
query.sql: SELECT dn.* FROM discrepancy_note dn WHERE parent_dn_id=? and dn.discrepancy_note_id = (select max(discrepancy_note_id) from discrepancy_note where parent_dn_id = ?)

query.name: getResolutionStatusIdForSubjectDNFlag
query.sql: select min(a.resolution_status_id) as resolution_status_id from ( select dn.discrepancy_note_id, dn.resolution_status_id from discrepancy_note dn where dn.parent_dn_id is NULL and dn.discrepancy_note_id in ( select dsm.discrepancy_note_id from dn_subject_map dsm where dsm.subject_id=? and dsm.column_name=? ) )as a
